extracted_text:
On August 25, 2025, ONGC Ltd. announced the commencement of natural gas sales from its Chinnewala Tibba field in the Rajasthan Kutch Onland Exploratory Asset (RKOEA) .

Monetization of Chinnewala Tibba field:ONGC officially began gas sales from the Discovered Small Field (DSF-II) block RJ/ONDSF/Chinnewala/2018. This marks the successful monetization of the field's natural gas reserves.

Increase in domestic energy production:The project reinforces ONGC's commitment to enhancing India's energy security by boosting domestic energy production.

Daily gas supply:The company has initiated sales of 100,000 standard cubic meters of gas per day (LSCMD), which will help meet the regional energy demands.

Gas supply recipient:The extracted gas is being supplied to Rajasthan Rajya Vidyut Utpadan Nigam Limited (RRVUNL) via ONGC's Gamnewala Gas Collection Station (GCS).
